game.title: Dreambuilder Game

game.short_description: Work in Progress. Survive No Man's Land, where TNT rains from the sky, and destroys everything. This is a Work in Progress, I wanna add more features & lore
game.title: No Man's Land

long_description:
### Description:

An explosive nuisance originally created by [Rui](https://content.minetest.net/users/Rui/) as "creeper". This re-implementation re-labels it as "sneeker" & updates for current Minetest versions.

### Licensing:

- Code: [MIT](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-sneeker/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)
- Textures: CC0
- Original by Rui: WTFPL
- tnt_function code from `minetest_game`: [MIT](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-sneeker/blob/master/tnt_function.lua)

### Usage:

Settings documented in [reference][].

### Links:

- [Reference][reference]
- [Changelog](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-sneeker/blob/master/changelog.txt)
- [TODO](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-sneeker/blob/master/TODO.txt)

Rui's original mod:

- Forum thread (deleted: `t=11891`)
- [Final version](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-sneeker/releases/tag/Rui)
- [Updated for Minetest 5.x](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-sneeker/releases/tag/5.x)


[reference]: https://antummt.github.io/mod-sneeker/docs/reference/
name: sneeker
title: Sneeker
